instructions: # Character Sheet## Whole Sheet:In order for the font to show up correctly in Chrome, you will have to *load unsafe scripts* using the gray sheild in the address bar of the browser.  ## Character tab Primary attribute names are buttons, rolling 1d10 plus twice the attribute.  The Difficult button rolls 1d10 plus just the attribute. ## Skills and Powers tab:The roll button rolls 1d10 plus skill ratingm plus the attribute selected in the dropdown menu.  ## CombatTab:The roll button rolls a 1d10, plus the listed skill rating as well as t he damage.  Damage is listed as the dice that is rolled and a multiplier.  When the Melee checkbox is checked, it adds strength, and checking both the melee checkbox and the two-handed checkbox adds strength plus one.##Possessions Tab:A place to list the gear you gathered... ## Notes:/rPlaces to store information you have gathered while running from the walking dead## Modified from All Flesh Must Be Eaten character sheet by John W.## Current Version: 1.0
